thread.title: NBA 2K16 Predicts Golden St. Warriors to Repeat as Champions
thread.title_full: NBA 2K16 Predicts Golden St. Warriors to Repeat as Champions

author: Steve_OS
title: NBA 2K16 Predicts Golden St. Warriors to Repeat as Champions
text: NBA 2K16 Predicts Golden St. Warriors to Repeat as Champions 02:46 PM - October 26, 2015 by Steve_OS 2K has simulated the 2015/2016 NBA season with NBA 2K16 and predict the Golden St. Warriors to repeat as champions, beating the Cleveland Cavaliers in 7 games. Check out some of the other details from the simulation below and post your thoughts and predictions! MVP Defensive Player of the Year Anthony Davis Returning the game....losing to the Warriors 4-2 is cheese I can't get behind. #gospursgo # 2 Don Jon @ 10/26/15 02:49 PM In my career the thunder beat the cavs in 6. Man... Lebron 2-4 in finals, by the time he retires in 2k he's gonna be 2-10 lol # 3 Mauer4MVP @ 10/26/15 02:55 PM 2k is not a fan of the Bucks team. They have at best finished with the 8 seed for me. Most of my sims have them missing the playoffs. # 4 Steve_OS @ 10/26/15 02:56 PM I'm diggin' the Pistons 5 seed, but I don't personally have high expectations for them this year. Hopefully they prove me wrong. # 5 BluFu @ 10/26/15 03:04 PM Lebron in the Finals, Washington out of the playoffs, Anthony Davis winning DPOY, and KD winning MVP... Just another 2K season. # 6 Crystar500 @ 10/26/15 03:09 PM The Bulls usually make the Finals whenever I simulate the first season. # 7 Trent Booty @ 10/26/15 03:18 PM I got Cavs beating the Thunder in 6 games, KD was MVP, DeAndre Jordan was DPOY and Russell was ROY. Jamal Crawford was 6MOY, and Hoiberg as COY. Otto Porter won MIP as well. # 8 Kodii Rockets @ 10/26/15 03:27 PM Quote: Originally Posted by Steve_OS I'm diggin' the Pistons 5 seed, but I don't personally have high expectations for them this year. Hopefully they prove me wrong. May the odds be ever in your favor # 9 drewwright @ 10/26/15 03:52 PM Pistons 5th seed...? Heat knocked out by Raptors in first round...? Suns in playoffs...? Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk # 10 wizfan2 @ 10/26/15 03:54 PM No Wizards in postseason, same old 2k sim issues
